00001 #include "stdio.h"
00002 #include "utility.h"
00003 #include "stdlib.h"
00004 #include "string.h"
00005 #include "math.h"
00006 
00007 #define  N_VARS  40
00008 
00009 /* current (April 92) output of data:
00010 
00011                 1. side
00012                 2. time
00013                 3. file name
00014                 4. hit number
00015                 5. stick ad (real)
00016                 6. stick yd (real)
00017                 7. stick xd (real)
00018                 8. stick a  (real)
00019                 9. stick y  (real)
00020                 10.stick x  (real)
00021                 11.stick p  (real)
00022                 12.stick ad (nominal)
00023                 13.stick yd (nominal)
00024                 14.stick xd (nominal)
00025                 15.stick a  (nominal)
00026                 16.stick y  (nominal)
00027                 17.stick x  (nominal)
00028                 18.stick p  (nominal)
00029                 19.command yd
00030                 20.command xd
00031                 21.desired p 
00032                 22.command y (real position)
00033                 23.command x (real position)
00034                 24.trigger velocity
00035                 25.wait time
00036                 26.stick result ad (real)
00037                 27.stick result yd (real)
00038                 28.stick result xd (real)
00039                 29.stick result a  (real)
00040                 30.stick result y  (real)
00041                 31.stick result x  (real)
00042                 32.stick result p  (real)
00043                 33.stick result ad (nominal)
00044                 34.stick result yd (nominal)
00045                 35.stick result xd (nominal)
00046                 36.stick result a  (nominal)
00047                 37.stick result y  (nominal)
00048                 38.stick result x (nominal)
00049                 39.stick result p  (nominal)
00050                 40.valid
00051                 
00052 */
00053  
00054 
00055 
00056 extern int get_string (char *comment, char *defaultvalue, char *value);
00057 extern int get_double (char *comment, double defaultvalue, double *value);
00058 
00059 main(void) {
00060 
00061 
00062 FILE    *in,*out;
00063 int     i,rc,which_side=0;
00064 char    name[100];
00065 double  v[100],aux;
00066 int     count=0;
00067 int     index;
00068 int     v_out[100] ;
00069 
00070 v_out[ 0] = 18;
00071 v_out[ 1] = 15;
00072 v_out[ 2] = 14;
00073 v_out[ 3] = 13;
00074 v_out[ 4] = 12;
00075 v_out[ 5] = 39;
00076 v_out[ 6] = 36;
00077 v_out[ 7] = 35;
00078 v_out[ 8] = 34;
00079 v_out[ 9] = 33;
00080 v_out[10] = 20;
00081 v_out[11] = 19;
00082 v_out[12] = 23;
00083 v_out[13] = 22;
00084 v_out[14] = 24;
00085 v_out[15] = 999;
00086 
00087 
00088 
00089 get_string("Name of Input File\0","c02735.hits\0",name);
00090 
00091 if ((in = fopen(name,"r")) == NULL) {
00092         printf("File >%s< not found\n",name);
00093         exit (-1);
00094 }
00095 
00096 get_string("Name of Output File\0","temp.data\0",name);
00097 
00098 if ((out = fopen(name,"w")) == NULL) {
00099         printf("File open error for >%s<\n",name);
00100         exit (-1);
00101 }
00102 
00103 get_double("Extract which side? LEFT=0 RIGHT=1",(double)which_side,&aux);
00104 which_side = aux;
00105 
00106 
00107 name[0] = ' ';  /* reset first element of name */
00108 index = 0;
00109 
00110 
00111 while ((rc=fgetc(in)) != EOF) {
00112         
00113         if (rc == '\n' || rc == ' ' || rc == '\t') {
00114                                 
00115                 name[index+1] = '\0'; /* just a hack to avoid stuff behind index */
00116                 name[index+2] = 'm';
00117                 name[index+3] = '\0';
00118                 
00119                 if (++count > N_VARS) {
00120                   if (v[1] == which_side) {
00121                     for(i=0; v_out[i] != 999; ++i) {
00122                       fprintf(out,"%f ",v[v_out[i]]);
00123                     }
00124                     fprintf(out,"\n");
00125                   }
00126                   count = 1;
00127                 }
00128                 
00129                 if (sscanf(name,"%lf",&v[count]) == 1)  {
00130                         /* printf("%f \n",v[count]); */
00131                 } else {
00132                         --count;
00133                 }
00134                 index = 0;
00135         
00136         } else {
00137         
00138                 ++index;
00139                 name[index] = rc;
00140                 name[index+1] = '\0';
00141                 
00142         }
00143         
00144 }
00145 
00146 fclose(in);
00147 fclose(out);
00148 
00149 }
